QuestData.Title: The Bad News
QuestData.Description: <You gently close Marley's eyes.>$B$B<Someone is going to have to tell General Twinbraid that the Horde has killed his only son.>$B$B<That someone is you.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the bad news to General Twinbraid at Twinbraid's Patrol in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the bad news to General Twinbraid at Twinbraid's Patrol in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: <General Twinbraid hurls his axeblade into the dirt, his voice quiet but his body quivering with disbelief and rage.>$B$BThat was my boy, $n. My only boy.$B$BThey've made it personal, $c. Personal.
